mods.abstract: Photograph on Page 20 shows a Louisiana agricultural exhibit titled "Where Nature Smiles" showcasing Corn Grown by Louisiana School Boys at the Louisiana State Fair in Shreveport.
mods.note: Alternate views of this photograph found on Page 7, image 150 and Page 12, image 151.
